travel.germany: Germany is considered the heart of Europe and offers the ideal environment for learning German. From the vibrant metropolises of Berlin, Hamburg, and Munich to charming university towns like Heidelberg or Freiburg – here you’ll find the perfect balance of education, history, and modern culture. A language stay in Germany means immersing yourself directly in the German language and everyday life
travel.austria: Discover Austria – a country full of culture, history, and breathtaking nature. Learn German in Vienna, Salzburg, or Graz and experience a blend of tradition and modern lifestyle. Its proximity to the Alps makes Austria especially attractive for those who wish to combine language courses with excursions into nature
travel.sw: Switzerland fascinates with its multilingualism, unique landscapes, and high quality of life. German is the most widely spoken language – and especially in cities like Zurich, Basel, or Lucerne, you can experience authentic Swiss German. A stay in Switzerland combines language learning with an international environment and unforgettable experiences.
